title: Shop Free People's Best Holiday Gifts - From Scrunchies to Lip Balms
description: Free People is one of our favorite retailers thanks to its wide selection of products - which includes everything from cozy wardrobe essentials to practical fitness gear and even coveted beauty products. We love it year-round, but during the holiday season, the brand transforms into a haven for gifting inspiration. Whether you're looking for a fashion gift for the stylish woman in your life, a cool piece of equipment that'll elevate anyone's workout game, or a unique gift that's sure to impress even the pickiest of recipients, there's something for everyone on your holiday shopping list - regardless of their product preferences (or your own personal budget). One of Free People's best features for narrowing down the best holiday gifts is its Top Rated page, where the most-desired clothing and accessories reside. Most of these options are offered in upward of 15 different shades, ranging from vibrant tones to neutrals. Another Free People perk is the abundance of reviews; countless customers weigh in on the products they purchased, often comparing the products to other popular items on the site, so you can be sure you're purchasing something truly worthwhile. To help simplify your holiday shopping this year, we curated a guide to the best Free People gifts, with top-rated selects from categories like fashion, beauty, home, and fitness. Our favorite finds include a luxurious sleep mask, a star-shaped lighting fixture that's perfect for seasonal decorating, a snuggly blanket, and wrist weights that are perfect for embracing TikTok's cozy cardio trend. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best gifts from Free People. Looking for something specific? Browse through our categories below: Best Beauty Gifts From Free People Best Fashion Gifts From Free People Best Home Gifts From Free People Best Fitness Gifts From Free People Related: Our 2024 Holiday Gift Guide Has Arrived! Shop Gifting Ideas From PS Editors
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: From bestselling sweaters to top-rated fragrance sets.
text: Skip to main contentWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Free People is one of our favorite retailers thanks to its wide selection of products — which includes everything from cozy wardrobe essentials to practical fitness gear and even coveted beauty products. We love it year-round, but during the holiday season, the brand transforms into a haven for gifting inspiration. Whether you're looking for a fashion gift for the stylish woman in your life, a cool piece of equipment that'll elevate anyone's workout game, or a unique gift that's sure to impress even the pickiest of recipients, there's something for everyone on your holiday shopping list — regardless of their product preferences (or your own personal budget). One of Free People's best features for narrowing down the best holiday gifts is its Top Rated page, where the most-desired clothing and accessories reside. Most of these options are offered in upward of 15 different shades, ranging from vibrant tones to neutrals. Another Free People perk is the abundance of reviews; countless customers weigh in on the products they purchased, often comparing the products to other popular items on the site, so you can be sure you're purchasing something truly worthwhile. To help simplify your holiday shopping this year, we curated a guide to the best Free People gifts, with top-rated selects from categories like fashion, beauty, home, and fitness. Our favorite finds include a luxurious sleep mask, a star-shaped lighting fixture that's perfect for seasonal decorating, a snuggly blanket, and wrist weights that are perfect for embracing TikTok's cozy cardio trend. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best gifts from Free People. Looking for something specific? Browse through our categories below: Best Beauty Gifts From Free People Best Fashion Gifts From Free People Best Home Gifts From Free People Best Fitness Gifts From Free People freepeople.comBest Lip BalmFree People Vegan Lip Balm ($10) For a small but mighty beauty gift that'll make all the difference in their everyday routine, go for this vegan lip balm. It's supremely hydrating and offers a gorgeous, subtle tint — per reviews. One shopper wrote on Free People's site: "Love these balms. The two tinted shades give the most subtle/sheer wash of color that I prefer to a heavy lip stick! Super hydrating too."freepeople.comBest Hair AccessoryKaxi Co. Chiffon Jumbo Scrunchie ($18) Never underestimate the power of an oversize scrunchie and the color pop it can add to your look. This silky jumbo design comes in six different colorways and is a best seller on the site. "This scrunchie is so adorable and pretty at the same time. I love how oversized it is. Perfect for work. Definitely buying more colors," one shopper wrote, who granted it five stars.freepeople.comBest Belt BagFP Movement Runner Sling ($28) It's always a great feat to find a functional belt bag that stays put during a run or other workouts, but this design, available in eight colorways and two adjustable sizing models, gets great reviews. "I can't properly express how fabulous this little number really is!" one shopper wrote. "Hands free at the gym, listening to music/podcasts while lifting weights without an armband getting in my way anymore. Gorgeous neoprene fabric! The belt is even stretchy! Able to wear it low-slung over my 44" hips." If you're curious about how the pack looks on, scroll down to the reviews to sift through plenty of IRL photos. freepeople.comBest Everyday BagFP Movement Quilted Carryall ($68) This versatile tote is seasonless, but it's great for packing all your essentials when you're running errands. Given its zipper closure and lightweight fabrication, it'd make for the perfect gym bag or grocery shopping carryall. You can shop it in 30 different shades and patterns. A happy shopper called it the "universal bag," writing: "I saw a woman when I was out shopping with this bag and I immediately knew I wanted one! It's fantastic! Arrived yesterday very big, spacious, and well made. I did take notice that they raised the price for these bags! Must be because they are so popular!!"freepeople.comBest Cozy SweaterFree People Easy Street Crop Pullover ($98) This cropped pullover, with ribbing throughout, is offered in 13 shades comprising neutrals and vibrant tones — like this mandarine red. The slightly exaggerated sleeves are spacious but then tapered at the wrists to add definition. This design would look just as great with a pair of dark-wash jeans as it would with joggers or lounge pants.freepeople.comBest Ankle BootsDr. Martens Leona Platform Ankle Boots ($200) Who doesn't love a trusty pair of Dr. Martens? We love that the brand is stocked at the retailer, as the combat boots and lug-sole loafers are a no-brainer accessory to team with most of the looks on Free People's site. The Leona silhouette is available in two shades, both of which would complement this season's biggest trends while maintaining their inimitable appeal with iconic signature yellow stitching.freepeople.comBest Holiday OrnamentSuzanne Oddy Design Good Luck Ornament ($30) What better way to show someone you care than with a little good luck charm? This dainty ornament boasts a horseshoe shape with a "lucky" inscription at the center. The product is also available in other designs, including a snake, cherry, and four leaf clover.freepeople.comBest Lighting FixtureFree People Starlightz Lantern ($46) This isn't your standard home lighting fixture — in fact, it's way cooler. The lantern has a star-shaped design that feels so on trend for the holiday season, but can really be displayed any time of year. Gift it to the decor-obsessed friend in your life, and they'll have so much fun styling it in a bedroom or office space.freepeople.comBest Unique CandleFree People Wine Bottle Candle ($74) This product encompasses two of our favorite things rolled into one: wine and a long-lasting candle. It's sure to be the talk of any gifting exchange and — unlike other candles — won't look like an eyesore on your coffee table or nightstand.freepeople.comBest Coffee MugWonkyware Bow Mug ($78) This adorable mug has a bow-inspired design complete with whimsical detailing and a cool texture. It's a great gift for any recipients you're unsure of what to give — like a colleague at work or a teacher.freepeople.comBest Cozy BlanketFree People Knot Blanket ($398) Is it even cozy season if you don't have a giant blanket to snuggle up in? This quirky blanket has a knotted design and is made from a knitted wool material that'll keep them feeling warm on even the chilliest winter days.freepeople.comBest Wrist WeightsFP Movement x Bala Exclusive Bangles 2 Lb. Weights ($75) With these stylish wrist weights, they can infuse a little more color into their workout routine and strengthen their arms while they're at it. The weights were designed in partnership with Bala and are available in two fun colorways.— Additional reporting by Sarah WasilakKyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.Sarah Wasilak is the associate director of Shopping at PS. With plenty of experience in the commerce market, a keen interest in SEO, and 10 years as an editor at the brand, she enjoys writing across the lifestyle and health-and-fitness categories. She has bylines at PS, InStyle, Elle, Refinery29, Who What Wear, Elite Daily, Byrdie, and The Quality Edit and aims to amplify minority voices in all her work.
html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Free People is one of our favorite retailers thanks to its wide selection of products — which includes everything from cozy wardrobe essentials to practical fitness gear and even coveted beauty products. We love it year-round, but during the holiday season, the brand transforms into a haven for gifting inspiration.

Whether you're looking for a fashion gift for the stylish woman in your life, a cool piece of equipment that'll elevate anyone's workout game, or a unique gift that's sure to impress even the pickiest of recipients, there's something for everyone on your holiday shopping list — regardless of their product preferences (or your own personal budget).

One of Free People's best features for narrowing down the best holiday gifts is its Top Rated page, where the most-desired clothing and accessories reside. Most of these options are offered in upward of 15 different shades, ranging from vibrant tones to neutrals. Another Free People perk is the abundance of reviews; countless customers weigh in on the products they purchased, often comparing the products to other popular items on the site, so you can be sure you're purchasing something truly worthwhile.

To help simplify your holiday shopping this year, we curated a guide to the best Free People gifts, with top-rated selects from categories like fashion, beauty, home, and fitness. Our favorite finds include a luxurious sleep mask, a star-shaped lighting fixture that's perfect for seasonal decorating, a snuggly blanket, and wrist weights that are perfect for embracing TikTok's cozy cardio trend. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best gifts from Free People.

Looking for something specific? Browse through our categories below:

  • Best Beauty Gifts From Free People
  • Best Fashion Gifts From Free People
  • Best Home Gifts From Free People
  • Best Fitness Gifts From Free People

Best Lip Balm

Free People Vegan Lip Balm ($10)

For a small but mighty beauty gift that'll make all the difference in their everyday routine, go for this vegan lip balm. It's supremely hydrating and offers a gorgeous, subtle tint — per reviews. One shopper wrote on Free People's site: "Love these balms. The two tinted shades give the most subtle/sheer wash of color that I prefer to a heavy lip stick! Super hydrating too."

Best Hair Accessory

Kaxi Co. Chiffon Jumbo Scrunchie ($18)

Never underestimate the power of an oversize scrunchie and the color pop it can add to your look. This silky jumbo design comes in six different colorways and is a best seller on the site.

"This scrunchie is so adorable and pretty at the same time. I love how oversized it is. Perfect for work. Definitely buying more colors," one shopper wrote, who granted it five stars.

Best Belt Bag

FP Movement Runner Sling ($28)

It's always a great feat to find a functional belt bag that stays put during a run or other workouts, but this design, available in eight colorways and two adjustable sizing models, gets great reviews.

"I can't properly express how fabulous this little number really is!" one shopper wrote. "Hands free at the gym, listening to music/podcasts while lifting weights without an armband getting in my way anymore. Gorgeous neoprene fabric! The belt is even stretchy! Able to wear it low-slung over my 44" hips." If you're curious about how the pack looks on, scroll down to the reviews to sift through plenty of IRL photos.

Best Everyday Bag

FP Movement Quilted Carryall ($68)

This versatile tote is seasonless, but it's great for packing all your essentials when you're running errands. Given its zipper closure and lightweight fabrication, it'd make for the perfect gym bag or grocery shopping carryall. You can shop it in 30 different shades and patterns.

A happy shopper called it the "universal bag," writing: "I saw a woman when I was out shopping with this bag and I immediately knew I wanted one! It's fantastic! Arrived yesterday very big, spacious, and well made. I did take notice that they raised the price for these bags! Must be because they are so popular!!"

Best Cozy Sweater

Free People Easy Street Crop Pullover ($98)

This cropped pullover, with ribbing throughout, is offered in 13 shades comprising neutrals and vibrant tones — like this mandarine red. The slightly exaggerated sleeves are spacious but then tapered at the wrists to add definition. This design would look just as great with a pair of dark-wash jeans as it would with joggers or lounge pants.

Best Ankle Boots

Dr. Martens Leona Platform Ankle Boots ($200)

Who doesn't love a trusty pair of Dr. Martens? We love that the brand is stocked at the retailer, as the combat boots and lug-sole loafers are a no-brainer accessory to team with most of the looks on Free People's site. The Leona silhouette is available in two shades, both of which would complement this season's biggest trends while maintaining their inimitable appeal with iconic signature yellow stitching.

Best Holiday Ornament

Suzanne Oddy Design Good Luck Ornament ($30)

What better way to show someone you care than with a little good luck charm? This dainty ornament boasts a horseshoe shape with a "lucky" inscription at the center. The product is also available in other designs, including a snake, cherry, and four leaf clover.

Best Lighting Fixture

Free People Starlightz Lantern ($46)

This isn't your standard home lighting fixture — in fact, it's way cooler. The lantern has a star-shaped design that feels so on trend for the holiday season, but can really be displayed any time of year. Gift it to the decor-obsessed friend in your life, and they'll have so much fun styling it in a bedroom or office space.

Best Unique Candle

Free People Wine Bottle Candle ($74)

This product encompasses two of our favorite things rolled into one: wine and a long-lasting candle. It's sure to be the talk of any gifting exchange and — unlike other candles — won't look like an eyesore on your coffee table or nightstand.

Best Coffee Mug

Wonkyware Bow Mug ($78)

This adorable mug has a bow-inspired design complete with whimsical detailing and a cool texture. It's a great gift for any recipients you're unsure of what to give — like a colleague at work or a teacher.

Best Cozy Blanket

Free People Knot Blanket ($398)

Is it even cozy season if you don't have a giant blanket to snuggle up in? This quirky blanket has a knotted design and is made from a knitted wool material that'll keep them feeling warm on even the chilliest winter days.

Best Wrist Weights

FP Movement x Bala Exclusive Bangles 2 Lb. Weights ($75)

With these stylish wrist weights, they can infuse a little more color into their workout routine and strengthen their arms while they're at it. The weights were designed in partnership with Bala and are available in two fun colorways.

— Additional reporting by Sarah Wasilak

Kyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

Sarah Wasilak is the associate director of Shopping at PS. With plenty of experience in the commerce market, a keen interest in SEO, and 10 years as an editor at the brand, she enjoys writing across the lifestyle and health-and-fitness categories. She has bylines at PS, InStyle, Elle, Refinery29, Who What Wear, Elite Daily, Byrdie, and The Quality Edit and aims to amplify minority voices in all her work.
